title: Coronavirus: China mourns Covid-19 victims with three-minute silence
description: A day of mourning is held for the 3,300 people who died in China, where the Covid-19 pandemic began.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 The silence was observed in Wuhan, where the virus originated late last year
China has mourned the victims of the coronavirus outbreak by observing a three-minute silence, bringing the nation to a halt.
